name: AVPlayer.HDRMode
desc: A bitfield type that specifies an HDR mode.

items.name: static var hlg: AVPlayer.HDRMode
items.desc: The Hybrid Log-Gamma HDR mode is available.

items.name: static var hdr10: AVPlayer.HDRMode
items.desc: The HDR10 HDR mode is available.

items.name: static var dolbyVision: AVPlayer.HDRMode
items.desc: The Dolby Vision HDR mode is available.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates an HDR mode with a string value.
